feed.title: theme.park Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.16.0
entry.content:
1.16.0 - 2024-02-25

Added

  • Sonarr: addons/sonarr-anime logo & text logo (yellow and sky blue)

Fixed

  • Fixed SWAG mod. Use git clone instead of svn on swag mod

  • Fixed VueTorrent mod

  • Fixed Sonarr Radarr login page addon logo

What's Changed

Other Changes

  • Move from subversion to git for pulling the qbittorrent webui by @nintendo424 in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/530
  • vuetorrent curl github redirect by @cjLGH in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/535
  • Update s6-overlay run for vuetorrent curl redirect by @cjLGH in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/536
  • Addons sonarr anime - logo & text logo (yellow and sky blue) by @andreirotariu in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/542
  • 1.16.0 by @GilbN in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/544

New Contributors

  • @nintendo424 made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/530
  • @cjLGH made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/535
  • @andreirotariu made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/542

Full Changelog: https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/compare/1.15.1...1.16.0

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.16.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Some fixes for qBittorrent, Emby and VueTorrent

Other Changes

  • 1.16.1 by @GilbN in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/549

Full Changelog: https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/compare/1.16.0...1.16.1

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.16.2
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Add fix for qbittorrent dockermod downloading the wrong webui files. Default is now downloading the latest stable webui. Override by adding QBITTORRENT_VERSION e.g. -e QBITTORRENT_VERSION=4.2.0
  • Some minor fixes on the servarr and prowlarr css.
  • Some minor fixes on the bazarr css.
  • Some minor fixes on the unraid css.

What's Changed

Other Changes

  • 1.16.2 by @GilbN in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/555

Full Changelog: https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/compare/1.16.1...1.16.2

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.17.0
entry.content:
New

  • New theme for Audiobookshelf by @PyrokineticDarkElf

Fixes

  • Update the other qbittorrent script with the new variable.

  • Adds QBITTORRENT_VERSION env that is used to download the correct version of the UI. If not set will download the latest stable version.

  • Update plex script for hotio path

  • Gitea: Fixes for 1.21.11

  • Blackberry: bump --text color by 69%

  • Revert npm shebang change

Changes

  • Docker: bump version to 3.19

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.18.0
entry.content:
New

  • Added Readarrtext logo addon: readarr-text-logo

  • Added Prowlarrtext logo addon: prowlarr-text-logo

  • Added Radarr anime logo addon: radarr-anime-logo

Fixed

  • Update audiobookshelf-base.css (https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/565)
